sentences.sentence: It has three hundred lights and six panpipe like arms which support these lights.
sentences.translation: 它拥有三百个灯泡和六个排箫状的臂杆支撑着这些灯泡。

sentences.sentence: He was still on the road, but now managed a group of panpipe musicians from Bolivia, even dressing up himself as an "authentic" Inca warrior to sell CDs and collect money from the audience.
sentences.translation: 他仍然在路上奔走，经营着一个来自玻利维亚的排笛乐团，有时甚至自己也装扮成“地道”的印加武士来兜售CD唱片，并帮乐队收钱。
